mapper.sql: jj.JJDBH, jj.AJZT, jj.BJDH, jj.BJDHYHDZ, jj.BJDHYHXM, jj.BJFSBH, jj.CASE_LEVEL, jj.BJLB, jj.BJLX, jj.BJXL, jj.BJNR, jj.BCJJNR, jj.BJRXM, jj.BJRXB, jj.BJSJ, jj.FKYQ, jj.GLJJDBH, jj.GXDWBH, jj.JJDWBH, jj.JJSJ, jj.JJYBH, jj.JJYXM, jj.LDGBH, jj.LHLXBH, jj.LXDH, jj.SDDWXZB, jj.SDDWYZB, jj.SFDZ, jj.SFSW, jj.SFSWYBJ, jj.TFHM, jj.TRANSMITUNIT, jj.XZQHBH, jj.YWBKRY, jj.YWBZXL, jj.YWWXWZ, jj.YWXAJBS, jj.ZAGJ, jj.ZDDWXZB, jj.ZDDWYZB, jj.ZFAJBS, jj.JAMS, jj.JAR, jj.JASJ, jj.T_PATROL_AREA_ID, jj.T_COMMUNITY_AREA_ID, jj.MARK, jj.MARK_USER_ID, jj.MARK_TIME, jj.GPS_CONFIG
mapper.select:
select , atlb.TYPE_NAME as BJLBMC,atlx.TYPE_NAME as BJLXMC,atxl.TYPE_NAME as BJXLMC from b_jjdb jj left join b_alarm_type atlb on jj.BJLB = atlb.TYPE_CODE left join b_alarm_type atlx on jj.BJLX = atlx.TYPE_CODE left join b_alarm_type atxl on jj.BJXL = atxl.TYPE_CODE where 1=1
AND jj.AJZT = #{ajzt,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select , atlb.TYPE_NAME as BJLBMC,atlx.TYPE_NAME as BJLXMC,atxl.TYPE_NAME as BJXLMC from b_jjdb jj left join b_alarm_type atlb on jj.BJLB = atlb.TYPE_CODE left join b_alarm_type atlx on jj.BJLX = atlx.TYPE_CODE left join b_alarm_type atxl on jj.BJXL = atxl.TYPE_CODE where jj.JJDBH = #{jjdbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into b_jjdb (JJDBH, AJZT, BJDH, BJDHYHDZ, BJDHYHXM, BJFSBH, CASE_LEVEL, BJLB, BJLX, BJXL, BJNR, BCJJNR, BJRXM, BJRXB, BJSJ, FKYQ, GLJJDBH, GXDWBH, JJDWBH, JJSJ, JJYBH, JJYXM, LDGBH, LHLXBH, LXDH, SDDWXZB, SDDWYZB, SFDZ, SFSW, SFSWYBJ, TFHM, TRANSMITUNIT, XZQHBH, YWBKRY, YWBZXL, YWWXWZ, YWXAJBS, ZAGJ, ZDDWXZB, ZDDWYZB, ZFAJBS, JAMS, JAR, JASJ, T_PATROL_AREA_ID, T_COMMUNITY_AREA_ID, MARK, MARK_USER_ID, MARK_TIME, GPS_CONFIG) values (#{jjdbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ajzt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bjdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjdhyhdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjdhyhxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjfsbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseLevel,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{bjlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjxl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bcjjnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjrxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjrxb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bjsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fkyq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gljjdbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gxdwbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jjdwbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jjsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jjybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jjyxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ldgbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lhlxbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lxdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sddwxzb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sddwyzb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfsw,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sfswybj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tfhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transmitunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xzqhbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ywbkry,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ywbzxl,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ywwxwz,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ywxajbs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{zagj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zddwxzb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zddwyzb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zfajbs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jams,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jasj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{tPatrolAreaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tCommunityAreaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mark,jdbcType=BIT}, #{markUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{markTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gpsConfig,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update b_jjdb set AJZT = #{ajzt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BJDH = #{bjdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BJDHYHDZ = #{bjdhyhdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BJDHYHXM = #{bjdhyhxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BJFSBH = #{bjfsbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_LEVEL = #{caseLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BJLB = #{bjlb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BJLX = #{bjlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BJXL = #{bjxl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BJNR = #{bjnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BCJJNR = #{bcjjnr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BJRXM = #{bjrxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BJRXB = #{bjrxb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BJSJ = #{bjsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FKYQ = #{fkyq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GLJJDBH = #{gljjdbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GXDWBH = #{gxdwbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JJDWBH = #{jjdwbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JJSJ = #{jjsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, JJYBH = #{jjybh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JJYXM = #{jjyxm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LDGBH = #{ldgbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LHLXBH = #{lhlxbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LXDH = #{lxdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SDDWXZB = #{sddwxzb,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, SDDWYZB = #{sddwyzb,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, SFDZ = #{sfdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SFSW = #{sfsw,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SFSWYBJ = #{sfswybj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TFHM = #{tfhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANSMITUNIT = #{transmitunit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XZQHBH = #{xzqhbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YWBKRY = #{ywbkry,jdbcType=INTEGER}, YWBZXL = #{ywbzxl,jdbcType=INTEGER}, YWWXWZ = #{ywwxwz,jdbcType=INTEGER}, YWXAJBS = #{ywxajbs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ZAGJ = #{zagj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZDDWXZB = #{zddwxzb,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ZDDWYZB = #{zddwyzb,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ZFAJBS = #{zfajbs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, JAMS = #{jams,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JAR = #{jar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JASJ = #{jasj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, T_PATROL_AREA_ID = #{tPatrolAreaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, T_COMMUNITY_AREA_ID = #{tCommunityAreaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MARK = #{mark,jdbcType=BIT}, MARK_USER_ID = #{markUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MARK_TIME = #{markTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GPS_CONFIG = #{gpsConfig,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where JJDBH = #{jjdbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select jj.JJDBH, jj.AJZT, jj.BJDH, jj.SFDZ, jj.BJDHYHXM, jj.BJFSBH,jj.CASE_LEVEL,jj.GXDWBH, jj.BJNR,jj.BJSJ,jj.BJLB,jj.BJLX,jj.MARK,atb.TYPE_NAME as BJLBMC,atx.TYPE_NAME as BJLXMC from b_jjdb jj left join b_alarm_type atb on jj.BJLB = atb.TYPE_CODE left join b_alarm_type atx on jj.BJLX = atx.TYPE_CODE where 1=1
AND jj.BJNR LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{keyWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' ) OR jj.BJDH LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{keyWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' ) OR JJDBH LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{keyWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' ) OR jj.SFDZ LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{keyWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%' )
order by jj.BJSJ desc
